name: CaveBoy (dice099)
description:
This was made following a Udemy video series that can be found at https://www.udemy.com/course/be-a-game-maker-with-gamemaker-studio-2/

All credit goes to Benjamin Anderson and Aaron Craig for the art asserts and music. I really wanted to make my own Metroid type game after finishing their lessons, but ran out of time! This is more of a short platformer style game, but I still wanted to turn this in, as it was my first time messing around with gamemaker studio! I enjoyed it. 

Arrow keys to move, space bar to begin game. Up arrow near doors to progress to next area. You can also ledge grab and jump on enemy heads. Be careful as it is buggy, especially if  you jump near the ceiling.
